titleStmt.title: A modest advertisement concerning the present controversie about church-government wherein the maine grounds of that booke, intituled The unlawfulnesse and danger of limited prelacie, are calmly examined.
titleStmt.author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Morley. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
